mapper.select: WITH recursive cte AS ( SELECT 1 as level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef FROM tbl_goods_category WHERE cateCodeRef IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 1 + level AS level, p.cateName, p.cateCode, p.cateCodeRef FROM tbl_goods_category p INNER JOIN cte ON p.cateCodeRef = cte.cateCode ) SELECT level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef FROM cte ORDER BY level, cateCode
